message: "The kids are always a step ahead of the adults, we've learned. So, in order to be proactive, we are trying to educate our parents as much as possible to be vigilant and know what is current," said Molly Esworthy, a social worker.

data.description: Social media and internet safety are two topics that will be discussed Thursday evening at Hereford High School between parents, students and a law enforcement expert. Police said the suspect in the deadly south Florida school shooting posed with guns over social media. The meeting was planned long....
data.title: Social media expert discusses online safety with parents
